message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $115. I think you'll find it's a steal at this rate!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $90 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $110.  It's a fantastic deal for a product you'll love!
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100
